divs: sighting detailsmy description of this ufo was reported this year but never followed through with the report i need too speak to someone, please email me with contact #.. or call..i am coming forward with also a video taken on cellphone by family member of the same thing i saw...one night i went outside too have a smoke and saw a fire in the sky with saucer inside it black\metalic with no lights and can see it very clearly with what looked like windows spinning counterclockwise but weren't it was hovering no noise at 1000-2000'in front of me at a 22 degree angle 300'above ground and 400+ feet in diameter the craft was dripping what looked like molten metal every couple of minutes.i was a skeptic but this thing got me traumatized it has been five years since this sighting and i found no like videos on youtube or anything the only closest thing is a video taken by family member it show the red molten metal craft above houses hovering and spinning with a orb trailing it going with a arc towards the ground it is very clear and i am trying to retrieve it from the old phone to upload on a computer.
Summary: saw alien space craft red molten look 200-300'hover above ground
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Monterey Park
There were no other sightings in Monterey Park on or around July 31st 2003
